TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItem extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a subitem of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件显示的项定义的列表类。A control displays a list of items that are defined by the class. 每个可以由定义的子项对象存储类。Each can store subitem objects that are defined by the class. 显示子项时的属性控件设置为。Subitems are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 通常情况下，子项包含到其父项相关的信息。Typically, subitems contain information that is related to their parent item. 例如，如果控件可以显示这些项表示订单，每个项可以显示订单号。For example, if a control displays items that represent orders, each item could display the order number. 子项无法添加到每个项目以显示如订购的产品信息、 订购，项的数量和订购的项目的总价格。Subitems could be added to each item to display information such as the product ordered, the quantity of items ordered, and the total price of the items ordered. 与不同对象，不能由用户直接编辑的对象 (用户可以编辑对象; 如果属性控件设置为`true`)。Unlike objects, objects cannot be edited directly by the user (the user can edit objects if the property of the control is set to `true`). 由于子项用户不能直接编辑，并且不会显示图像，属性仅限于那些影响子项文本的样式中显示时控件。Because subitems cannot be directly edited by the user and do not display images, properties are limited to those that affect the style of the subitem text when it is displayed in the control. 如果的属性包含这些子项设置为`false`，可以使用， ，并属性以更改应用于文本显示样式。If the property of the that contains the subitems is set to `false`, you can use the , , and properties to change the styles applied to the text display. 通常情况下，项和子项的样式都在相同控件，但如果你想要更改的特定样式以突出显示它，您可以在你想要以不同方式显示的项上使用这些属性。Typically, the styles of the item and the subitems are the same in a control, but if you want to change the style of a specific to highlight it, you can use these properties on the items you want to display differently. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 您需要将代码添加到和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该子项文本的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the subitem's text.
A that represents the background color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来更改显示子项文本的背景的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the subitem text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的前景色和背景颜色组合 (使用要设置的前景色属性) 来区分从另一个子项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one subitem from another. 例如，可以设置属性设置为来标识显示负值的子项。For example, you could set the property to to identify subitems that display a negative value. 如果的属性拥有该子项设置为`true`，设置此属性产生任何影响。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置子项显示的文本的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the subitem.

value.span: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 。

span.span: The to apply to the text displayed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于更改应用于该子项文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the font styles applied to the text of the subitem. 如果的属性设置为`true`，更改此属性会产生任何效果。If the property of the is set to `true`, changing this property will have no effect. 因为是不可变的 （这意味着您不能调整其任何属性），您可以只分配属性指定新。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 但是，您可以基于现有字体中的新字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 以下是如何调整现有字体以粗体显示的示例：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = new Font(listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = New Font(ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, _ ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` 如果的属性拥有该子项设置为`true`，设置此属性产生任何影响。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性设置为`false`定义的自定义样式对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the foreground color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用要更改的子项文本的颜色属性。You can use the property to change the color of the subitem text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的前景色和背景颜色组合 (使用属性来设置背景色) 来区分从另一个项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the background color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，可以设置属性设置为标识中具有负数与之关联的项目。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have a negative number associated with them. 如果的属性拥有该子项设置为`true`，设置此属性产生任何影响。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性设置为`false`定义的自定义样式对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将应用于子项的样式重置为默认字体和颜色。

span.span: Resets the styles applied to the subitem to the default font and colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于重置字体、 背景色和前景色设置将应用于子项。You can use this method to reset the font, background color, and foreground color settings applied to the subitem. 样式会重置，请使用默认字体、 背景色和前景色设置显示该子项。When the styles are reset, the subitem is displayed using the default font, background color, and foreground color settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重置的子项的样式使用属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to reset the style of the subitems of a through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1`, and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#2)]
